name: Chippy - GameClub
description:
Serve customers the right orders in this unique time-management game for all ages.

It’s up to you to serve the customers as they come into your Chippy. Time-management is the key to success! Take orders, get cooking and try not to burn anything in this fun food game featuring a cast of colourful characters, simple one-touch controls and nostalgic soundtrack.

Sounds easy... but turn up the heat and Chippy can become mind over matter madness!

Featuring

• 40 Levels

• Earn new equipment for your shop

• Challenges and upgrades

• Shakable Salt, Vinegar & Ketchup

• New food, condiments, levels coming in free updates

A family-friendly time-management game. Chippy is the perfect game to play whether you’re at home, on the train or playing with kids!
**************************************************

Chippy is playable for free, with some sections and features available only to subscribers of GameClub Pro, an optional auto-renewing monthly subscription which also removes ads. Besides the GameClub Pro subscription, there are no other in-app purchases in this game.
If you choose to purchase the optional subscription:
- Payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase. No charge will be made for the free trial period.
- Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
- Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior of the current period, at the cost indicated.
- You can manage your subscriptions and turn off auto-renewal by going to your App Store account settings after purchase.
- Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable
- Terms of use: https://gameclub.io/terms
- Privacy Policy: https://gameclub.io/privacy
